pkgmetadata.longdescription: QHttpEngine provides a simple set of classes for developing HTTP server applications in Qt. The design goals of QHttpEngine include: Reliability - extremely exhaustive test suite ensures that bugs are caught as soon as they are introduced. Flexibility - classes are designed for easy integration with existing Qt code. Simplicity - everything is intentionally kept as simple as possible. Usability - documentation is provided for all classes. All of QHttpEngine's functionality is included in a single monolithic library.
